reviewText:
This DVD is useful if you are interesting in developing these kind of skills- although don't expect an magic secrets, apart from what is pretty obvious- gradual conditioning, and direction of chi. Essentially, there are no secrets and no tricks involved in this skill.

Still it is worth buying. I suppose the main value is inspiration and encouragement.

P.S. I don't think the author can actually do fingertip handstands, he does not demonstrated anywhere on the DVD.
